# HUD::SET_BIGMAP_ACTIVE

## Summary
Sets the big map active/inactive

## Parameters
* **BOOL** active
* **BOOL** fullMap = true

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles the big minimap state like in GTA:Online.
